languages.english-overview:
BlaB! is a fully resizeble, multilanguage PHP/AJAX based and best viewed with any browser web chat that supports PHP4+ and MySQL, SQLite & PostgreSQL databases.
It has guest login, built-in user registration system, sound notifications, changeable sets of emoticons, history that can be kept forever and much more!
BlaB! License Agreement.

ul.li: Supports almost any available browser today: MSIE7+, Opera, Mozilla Firefox, Safari and Google Chrome.
NO FLASH & NO JAVA: no additional plugins / server modules required
100% resizable, you can run it in iframes of almost any size
Ban users and IP addresses from Admin CP
Paint, share & play paintings in chat
History, bad words removal, Admin CP

languages.english-err_passlen5to12: Password should be between 5 to 12 characters.
languages.english-err_alphanumpass: Password should contain atleast one upper case, one lower case and one numeric character.
